channel.title: Black Mesa Arrival Mod !?
channel.description:
[i]I don't know whether this is the right section for but I would like to ask the community, if it is possible, to expand the first scene in BMS into a true "arrival in Black Mesa facility" scene ? It is a shame that you can't explore the first scene and the level design failed his task![/i]
I speak about this scenes: [img]https://img715.imageshack.us/img715/483/blackmesainbound2.jpg[/img]
[i]Enter the train by yourselve... I think it would be better, more atmospheric, if given the opportunity! I don't want a outdoor scene like Blue Shift or Opposing Force... only a "i wait in lobby on my train" scene[/i]
Anyone has seen this picture on the World Wide Web? [img]https://img89.imageshack.us/img89/1658/blackmesa30mintolate.jpg[/img]
[b]1st:[/b] Black Screen with BMS Title Font appears
[b]2nd:[/b] You stand in the lobby and train arrives in 2-3 min [i](You have time to explore)[/i]
[b]3rd:[/b] You enter the train [i](Only when you enter the train, the real game begins)[/i] the door close and the train start his tour to Sector C Anomalous Materials
